description: Literally "Fan Filter". Refers to the phenomenon where a fan loves a celebrity so much that they have a biased view, unable to see flaws or negative aspects.

examples.chinese: 真的帅出天际,这句话真的不是粉丝滤镜
examples.translation: Really handsome beyond limits, this statement is really not through a fan filter.

examples.chinese: 不带粉丝滤镜的说,每部都理中客就好看
examples.translation: Speaking without a fan filter, every part is objectively good to watch.

examples.chinese: 求推荐一部没有粉丝滤镜,纯粹吸引路人的剧
examples.translation: Please recommend a drama without fan filter, one that purely attracts passers-by.
